sentences.en: Always alert to potential attacks and thwart them before they happen.
sentences.cn: 时刻警惕可能存在的抨击,先发制人.

sentences.en: Analysts of small business recognize that several economic factors tend to thwart this business form.
sentences.cn: 小企业分析家们发现某些经济因素势必会阻挠小企业的发展.

sentences.en: Fierce opposition thwarted the government’s plans.
sentences.cn: 激烈的反对阻碍了政府计划的实施。

sentences.en: God knew that he had never wished to thwart her in anything!
sentences.cn: 他从来就不愿使她拂意过,这有老天可表!

sentences.en: He made the fish fast to bow and stern and to the middle thwart.
sentences.cn: 他把绑鱼的绳子系在船头、船梢的中间的坐板上.

sentences.en: He made the fish fast to the bow, the stern and to the middle thwart.
sentences.cn: 他把鱼系在船头 、 船梢和中间的坐板上.

sentences.en: He sat down and, clinging to the thwart, began to sob quietly.
sentences.cn: 他坐下去, 抓住了座板, 开始低声哭泣.

sentences.en: I don't think that will thwart our purposes.
sentences.cn: 我认为那不会使我们的目的受到挫折.

sentences.en: I dropped upon the thwart again , none too soon , for I was near overboard.
sentences.cn: 我松开绳子重新跳回小筏子时, 差一点掉进水里.

sentences.en: Our course must thwart those designs.
sentences.cn: 我们的方针是必须挫败他们这种企图.

sentences.en: Parameterized stored procedures that validate all user input can be used to thwart SQL injection attacks.
sentences.cn: 验证所有用户输入的参数化存储过程可用于阻止SQL注入攻击.

sentences.en: Shrinking grazing areas and a lack of investment in fodder trees may thwart a sustainable revival.
sentences.cn: 放牧面积的不断缩小以及缺乏对饲料树木的投资,可能会阻碍骆驼的持续复苏.

sentences.en: The new credit cards have many features which are designed to thwart forgers.
sentences.cn: 新的信用卡有许多特徵,是设计用来防止伪造的.

sentences.en: The some people brushes teeth the elephant pulls to saw, and also be thwart brush.
sentences.cn: 有些人刷牙象拉锯, 也就是横着刷.

sentences.en: To thwart the aerial reconnaissance, one species of caterpillar has adopted a novel dining style.
sentences.cn: 为了应对这种高空侦查, 有一种毛毛虫采取了很新奇的用餐方式.

sentences.en: We must thwart his malevolent schemes.
sentences.cn: 我们决不能让他的恶毒阴谋得逞.

trans.tran_cn: 阻挠， 使受挫折， 挫败
trans.tran_en: to prevent someone from doing what they are trying to do

trans.tran_cn: 阻挠，使受挫折，挫败，<旧>横过
trans.tran_en: to prevent someone from doing what they are trying to do
